title: Personalized Education Program (PEP)
shortDescription: Florida scholarship providing education savings accounts for eligible K-12 students.
description: The Personalized Education Program (PEP) is one of Florida's newest school choice options, providing eligible students with an Education Savings Account to cover private school tuition and other approved educational expenses. The program offers families flexibility in how they use scholarship funds to customize their child's education. PEP is available to students who meet eligibility requirements and can be used at approved private schools and providers throughout Florida.
benefits: Education Savings Account for flexible spending
eligibility: Student must be a Florida resident and meet specific eligibility criteria established by the program. Income requirements and other criteria apply. Check with the funding organization for current eligibility guidelines.
howToApply: Apply through Step Up For Students, the scholarship funding organization. Documentation requirements include proof of Florida residency and income verification.
